definition: to support/to prop up/to push or move with a pole/to maintain/to open or unfurl/to fill to bursting point/brace/stay/support

sentences.english: Try push-ups, abdominal crunches and leg squats.
sentences.chinese: 试试俯卧撑，仰卧起坐和下蹲起立。

sentences.english: Go outside and take a walk. Maybe do some push-ups.
sentences.chinese: 出去散散步，或者做几个俯卧撑。

sentences.english: Don’t do all variations of pushups, for example.
sentences.chinese: 比如说，不要只做各种各样的俯卧撑。

sentences.english: Group A-push ups, free falls, leg circles and cuts.
sentences.chinese: 组俯卧撑，自由倒地，旋腿与分切。

sentences.english: Record the number of push-ups you complete in your notebook or journal.
sentences.chinese: 在你的笔记本和日记中记录俯卧撑的次数。

sentences.english: B: Well, I love to do push-ups, and I go cycling every day.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢做俯卧撑，每天我都骑单车。
做三组每组五个俯卧撑。

sentences.english: I can keep doing push-up for one hundred times everyday.
sentences.chinese: 我能每天坚持做俯卧撑一次，每次一口气100个。

sentences.english: Push-ups can help you measure muscular strength.
sentences.chinese: 俯卧撑可以帮助你的测试肌肉强度。
呼啦圈，仰卧起坐，俯卧撑。

sentences.english: Do challenges, like races or pushup or pullup challenges.
sentences.chinese: 提出挑战，如跑步比赛或俯卧撑。

sentences.english: For example, if someone says "I did 30 push-ups this morning."
sentences.chinese: 例如，一个人说“我早上做了30个俯卧撑”。

sentences.english: I do pushups with them on my back.
sentences.chinese: 做俯卧撑时，我让孩子骑在背上。

sentences.english: Start in pushup position, but with your shins on a Swiss ball.
sentences.chinese: 以俯卧撑姿势开始，使小腿胫骨位于平衡球上。

sentences.english: A great exercise used to measure core strength is the standard push-up. However, they are only effective if done properly.
sentences.chinese: 一个很好的用来测量身体力量的练习叫做俯卧撑。

sentences.english: A great exercise used to measure core strength is the standard push-up.
sentences.chinese: 一个很好的用来测量身体力量的练习叫做俯卧撑。
